{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":78091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":78092,"originalJapaneseLine":"室内はランス城にあるランスの部屋そのもの。","translatedEnglishLine":"The interior was exactly Lance's room in Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":78093,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、窓の外に広がる景色だけは","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the scenery spreading outside the window"},{"lineNumber":78094,"originalJapaneseLine":"普段のそれとまったく別物だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"was completely different from the usual one."},{"lineNumber":78095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、これ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is this...?"},{"lineNumber":78096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここはどこだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where am I?\""},{"lineNumber":78097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いや、見覚えがある……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no, I recognize this place...\""},{"lineNumber":78098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This place..."},{"lineNumber":78099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　――織田城か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"—Is it Oda Castle?\""},{"lineNumber":78100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、これ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is this...?"},{"lineNumber":78101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここはどこだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where am I?\""},{"lineNumber":78102,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはランスも知らない","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a fortress built in a mountainous area, unknown even to Lance."},{"lineNumber":78103,"originalJapaneseLine":"山岳地帯に作られた砦だった。","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":78104,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPAN――","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN—"},{"lineNumber":78105,"originalJapaneseLine":"尾張、織田城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Owari, Oda Castle—"},{"lineNumber":78106,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城での戦いに敗れたランス達は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Having lost the battle at Lance Castle, Lance and his group"},{"lineNumber":78107,"originalJapaneseLine":"現在その本拠地をJAPANに移動させていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"had currently moved their base of operations to JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":78108,"originalJapaneseLine":"織田城の大広間に","translatedEnglishLine":"In the great hall of Oda Castle,"},{"lineNumber":78109,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の錚々たる面子が集っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the distinguished members of Lance Castle had gathered."},{"lineNumber":78110,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の参謀達は何事か小声で話し合い――","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle's strategists were quietly discussing something—"},{"lineNumber":78111,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは壁に背を預けたまま仏頂面で腕を組み、","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella leaned against the wall, arms crossed with a sour expression,"},{"lineNumber":78112,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人討伐隊の面々も並ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the members of the demon subjugation squad stood in line as well."},{"lineNumber":78113,"originalJapaneseLine":"またJAPANの主要な人物達もその場にいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, important figures of JAPAN were present there."},{"lineNumber":78114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーう、見たことあるような顔もチラホラいるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hoo, I see some familiar faces here and there.\""},{"lineNumber":78115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、皆さん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, everyone."},{"lineNumber":78116,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遅れました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm late.\""},{"lineNumber":78117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!\""},{"lineNumber":78118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス、もう大丈夫なのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance, are you alright now!?\""},{"lineNumber":78119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺様があの程度の怪我で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, do you think a mere injury like that would stop me!?"},{"lineNumber":78120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうにかなるものか！」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":78121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I see... That's good...\""},{"lineNumber":78122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":78123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いや……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no... Don't talk so arrogantly.\""},{"lineNumber":78124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　え、偉そうなことを言うんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":78125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前はサテラの使徒なんだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're Satella's apostle,"},{"lineNumber":78126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次からはあんな醜態は晒すなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so don't ever show such a disgraceful sight again."},{"lineNumber":78127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いいな、絶対だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Got it? Absolutely."},{"lineNumber":78128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、はいはい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes, yes.\""},{"lineNumber":78129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今から会議を始めるところなんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We're about to start the meeting now."},{"lineNumber":78130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス兄様の為に現状報告も兼ねましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's also report the current situation for Lord Lance's sake.\""},{"lineNumber":78131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、任せる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I'll leave it to you.\""},{"lineNumber":78132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まず、ランス城での防衛戦ですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Firstly, regarding the defense battle at Lance Castle..."},{"lineNumber":78133,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらは人類側の敗北に終わりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"it ended in defeat for the human side.\""},{"lineNumber":78134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レッドアイの猛攻、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The fierce assault of the Red Eye,"},{"lineNumber":78135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてそれに気を大きくした魔軍の侵攻」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the subsequent empowered invasion of the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":78136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス城は為す術なく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"left Lance Castle helpless..."},{"lineNumber":78137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　陥落しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"which fell."},{"lineNumber":78138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":78139,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の城だぞ、ムカつく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's my castle, damn it...\""},{"lineNumber":78140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内はランス城にあるランスの部屋そのもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The interior was exactly Lance's room in Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、窓の外に広がる景色だけは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the scenery spreading outside the window

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段のそれとまったく別物だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was completely different from the usual one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはランスも知らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a fortress built in a mountainous area, unknown even to Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山岳地帯に作られた砦だった。
ランス城での戦いに敗れたランス達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having lost the battle at Lance Castle, Lance and his group

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在その本拠地をJAPANに移動させていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had currently moved their base of operations to JAPAN.
In the great hall of Oda Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の錚々たる面子が集っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the distinguished members of Lance Castle had gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の参謀達は何事か小声で話し合い――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle's strategists were quietly discussing something—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは壁に背を預けたまま仏頂面で腕を組み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella leaned against the wall, arms crossed with a sour expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊の面々も並ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the members of the demon subjugation squad stood in line as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またJAPANの主要な人物達もその場にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, important figures of JAPAN were present there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーう、見たことあるような顔もチラホラいるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoo, I see some familiar faces here and there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス、もう大丈夫なのか！？」
「がははは、俺様があの程度の怪我で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, do you think a mere injury like that would stop me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、偉そうなことを言うんじゃない」
「お前はサテラの使徒なんだ、
次からはあんな醜態は晒すなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so don't ever show such a disgraceful sight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今から会議を始めるところなんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're about to start the meeting now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス兄様の為に現状報告も兼ねましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's also report the current situation for Lord Lance's sake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、ランス城での防衛戦ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Firstly, regarding the defense battle at Lance Castle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらは人類側の敗北に終わりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it ended in defeat for the human side."
"The fierce assault of the Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれに気を大きくした魔軍の侵攻」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the subsequent empowered invasion of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の城だぞ、ムカつく……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内はランス城にあるランスの部屋そのもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The interior was exactly Lance's room in Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、窓の外に広がる景色だけは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the scenery spreading outside the window

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段のそれとまったく別物だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was completely different from the usual one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはランスも知らない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a fortress built in a mountainous area, unknown even to Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山岳地帯に作られた砦だった。
ランス城での戦いに敗れたランス達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having lost the battle at Lance Castle, Lance and his group

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在その本拠地をJAPANに移動させていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had currently moved their base of operations to JAPAN.
In the great hall of Oda Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の錚々たる面子が集っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the distinguished members of Lance Castle had gathered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の参謀達は何事か小声で話し合い――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle's strategists were quietly discussing something—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは壁に背を預けたまま仏頂面で腕を組み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella leaned against the wall, arms crossed with a sour expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊の面々も並ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the members of the demon subjugation squad stood in line as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またJAPANの主要な人物達もその場にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, important figures of JAPAN were present there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーう、見たことあるような顔もチラホラいるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoo, I see some familiar faces here and there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス、もう大丈夫なのか！？」
「がははは、俺様があの程度の怪我で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, do you think a mere injury like that would stop me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、偉そうなことを言うんじゃない」
「お前はサテラの使徒なんだ、
次からはあんな醜態は晒すなよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so don't ever show such a disgraceful sight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今から会議を始めるところなんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're about to start the meeting now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス兄様の為に現状報告も兼ねましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's also report the current situation for Lord Lance's sake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、ランス城での防衛戦ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Firstly, regarding the defense battle at Lance Castle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらは人類側の敗北に終わりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it ended in defeat for the human side."
"The fierce assault of the Red Eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれに気を大きくした魔軍の侵攻」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the subsequent empowered invasion of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の城だぞ、ムカつく……」
